title: Installation issue: cmake fails to build on gcc@9.2.0
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install cmake %gcc@9.2.0
==> Installing cmake
==> Searching for binary cache of cmake
==> Finding buildcaches at http://spack.pi.sjtu.edu.cn/mirror/build_cache
==> No binary for cmake found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /lustre/home/rpm/.spack/sourcecache/cmake/cmake-3.15.4.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /tmp/rpm/spack-stage-cmake-3.15.4-ajmffz4seurk6hiw5uv4octb35zklaji/cmake-3.15.4.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /tmp/rpm/spack-stage-cmake-3.15.4-ajmffz4seurk6hiw5uv4octb35zklaji
==> No patches needed for cmake
==> Building cmake [Package]
==> Executing phase: 'bootstrap'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 7:
    './bootstrap' '--prefix=/lustre/opt/cascadelake/linux-centos7-skylake_avx512/gcc-9.2.0/cmake-3.15.4-ajmffz4seurk6
hiw5uv4octb35zklaji' '--parallel=6' '--no-system-libs' '--no-qt-gui' '--' '-DCMAKE_USE_OPENSSL=True'

1 error found in build log:
     1    ==> Executing phase: 'bootstrap'
     2    ==> [2019-11-09-16:02:41.676422] './bootstrap' '--prefix=/lustre/opt/cascadelake/linux-centos7-skylake_avx
          512/gcc-9.2.0/cmake-3.15.4-ajmffz4seurk6hiw5uv4octb35zklaji' '--parallel=6' '--no-system-libs' '--no-qt-gu
          i' '--' '-DCMAKE_USE_OPENSSL=True'
     3    ---------------------------------------------
     4    CMake 3.15.4, Copyright 2000-2019 Kitware, Inc. and Contributors
     5    C compiler on this system is: /lustre/opt/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc
     6    ---------------------------------------------
  >> 7    Error when bootstrapping CMake:
     8    Cannot find a C++ compiler that supports both C++11 and the specified C++ flags.
     9    Please specify one using environment variable CXX.
     10   The C++ flags are "".
     11   They can be changed using the environment variable CXXFLAGS.
     12   See cmake_bootstrap.log for compilers attempted.
     13   ---------------------------------------------

See build log for details:
  /tmp/rpm/spack-stage-cmake-3.15.4-ajmffz4seurk6hiw5uv4octb35zklaji/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux login2.pi.sjtu.edu.cn 3.10.0-862.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Apr 20 16:44:24 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 (Core)
```
